inn1.comm: good length delivery to begin, not much pace on it. On off and so Charles gets behind the line to defend
slightly wide and crashed through the covers! Terrific timing and that just races across. Not a great delivery. Fullish length swinging away and a lot of width
much fuller just outside off, a little bit of away movement. Charles blocks with the full face

and gone! Charles wafts loosely away from his body, the ball stops on him a touch and Charles lobs a catch to Dilshan at point. Malinga strikes in the first over in successive games. Charles has to go. Not a great shot, must be said. Discernible pace change from the pitch in Colombo, this is a lot slower
back of a length outside off, swinging away. Not much feet movement. He blocks with his feet rooted in the crease
better delivery. Swing away from the batsman on a good length, just outside off. Defended
fullish length moving away. Good delivery, nice length that. Fletcher defends
terrific line and length. Full again, zoning in on off. Blocked off the front foot
short and wide and dispatched. Too wide and Fletcher doesn't bother keeping that down. Goes through with the cut, and the ball goes well over point and into the boundary
full and moving away on a sixth-stump line, steered to point
good length now, dragged his length back a touch, but the line is similar, closer to that fifth-stump line. Blocked towards point
full again, slightly wider outside off. Pushed to cover
shortish length outside off, a better ball to stay back and play. He dabs it to third man with the open face of the bat

fuller now, but the lines have been good. Fletcher comes forward and plays a bit too early, the ball stops and hits the bat close to the handle and Fletcher has to withdraw his hand at the last instance. Defended safely though
tight lines continue. Full outside off, Fletcher gets a good stride forward to defend
shortish and slightly wide, deserved to be put away but Fletcher cuts it towards point where Dilshan puts in a good diving stop
yorker. Terrific yorker on off. Digs it out does Fletcher
fuller on off. Driven to mid-on off the front foot
good length on off, Blackwood stays back and pushes the ball towards mid-on for a quick single. Good run.
fuller than a good length and straight, neatly tucked away off his pads through square leg for a couple
not a great shot again! Full on off and Fletcher wants to force this down the ground but the ball rushes onto him and he lobs a ball towards mid-off, bounces just in front of him

and he goes this time! An unconvincing innings comes to an end. Full on leg and Fletcher walks across and misses a straight one. But he wants the review. And the covers are coming on now too. What drama. That has to miss leg for Fletcher to survive. Just about shaves leg stump but the shuffle may have prompted the decision from the umpire
picked off his legs delectably first up, although a rather poor delivery to start. Straying on Bravo's legs who clips this uppishly towards fine leg
good length on leg, and whipped down to fine leg with a nice nudge
yorker attempted again on off, dug out towards point for a quick single. Good run from the pair
good short delivery, doesn't rise that high though. Blackwood jumps on his toes and plays a forward block right under his eyes
that's a better short delivery. Hustled Blackwood as it is aimed at his badge, he gets under that late
slower delivery but very wide outside off, Blackwood shapes to cut and goes after that but misses

another short delivery. Another wicket. Poor shot once again. It is a good short delivery outside off, Blackwood tries to steer one to third man but doesn't ride the bounce well enough and ends up spooning another catch to Dilshan at point. Got a tad big on him but did not play that well
slower yorker on middle, Samuels gets behind it and blocks
fullish length but drifts down leg and a wide is called
shot ... but straight to cover. Good length, swinging back in outside off. Bravo stays back and punches a good-looking back foot drive to cover
some swing. Full and coming back in, Bravo is looking to play through the off side but the swing and the angle takes the ball to midwicket
shortish on leg, nudged towards square leg
drifts down leg yet again, starts the ball on leg and continues down leg
bowled im. Bravo leaves a straight one. Full and swinging back in but Bravo doesn't pick that prodigious inswing. He chooses to leave and the ball thumps into off stump. WI in real trouble now.
aah nice, good length and moving away. Tempting Ramdin to drive but he wants nothing to do with it. Leaves it alone
nice finish. Fuller than a good length on off, Ramdin has to play at that and defends towards mid-on
bouncer on middle, not too pacey and Samuels can easily get under that
good bowling this, real testing stuff. Full and swinging away outside off and with slips in place, that's a relaly clever delivery. Samuels chooses to leave and acknowledges Malinga with a nod
on a good length and swinging away, left alone
good bouncer again on middle, Samuels has to hustle under that and let go
crashed through the off side. But again finds the fielder at cover. Good length moving away, Samuels flays at that and creams it too.
shot. Finds the gap this time. Good length outside off, and Samuels throws his hands at that and finds the gap through cover point. Slow outfield means the ball won't carry to the boundary
full but drifts down leg yet again, clips Ramdin's pad on the way towards fine leg
impeccable lines and lengths. This is impressive to watch. Good length swinging away outside off, almost Test-match stuff. Samuels leaves
sloppy from SL there. Lakmal pushes this down leg and continues to go down. The ball bounces just in front of Kusal and he can't stop it either
too wide and too short. Samuels lays into that and just times it to the boundary. Magnificent shot. Did not muscle that despite all of his strength. Poor ball and adequately dealt with that
the inconsistency continues. Full and too wide, Samuels stays in his crease with no feet movement and muscles that through cover for four more

third boundary in the over but this is a lot more fortuitous for MS. Fuller than a good length outside off and gets MS fishing at that, a thick outside edge falls just short of second slip who fumbles and the balls carries to the third man boundary
good length towards leg stump. Hits MS on the pads but not much of an appeal. Too high and a lot of doubt
nice start, no swing though. Hits a back of a length on middle and leg, gets Ramdin jumping in his crease and playing with soft hands towards square leg for a quick single
good length outside off, not much swing. But pacey nonetheless. Samuels mis-times his drive to cover
full on middle and leg, clipped fiercely towards Malinga at mid-on who puts in a good diving stop. A fumble allows them the second
looked for a bit too much. Goes well down leg and wide called
full length towards off, drilled to mid-off from the crease
too short outside off. Called wide. Way over his head
close to 145 ks, good length on middle, inside-halved to square leg for one
slightly shortish outside off, dabbed to third man off the back foot. Good stroke
full on leg and Ramdin is struck on his pads. A big appeal but that was drifting down leg, and high. Easy call
nice from both players. Full length outside off, a bit of outswing. Ramdin doesn't get a big stride but pushes at that confidently and finds the gap through cover
fullish outside off, driven to mid-off with a  good stride on this occasion
drifts on leg again, a bit too inconsistent here is Lakmal. Clipped nicely but straight to square leg
nice again from both bowler and batsman. Fullish outside off, a fifth-stump line. Ramdin times a straight drive to Lakmal who stops it nicely in his follow through
fuller than a good length outside off, defended off the front foot into the off side
full on off, blocked off the front foot towards mid-off
blasted down the ground. He cleared one foot and clobbered a drive past the bowler. Too full outside off and just pummeled. Counterattacking knock here
good length but down leg, tickled towards fine leg for a single

he has been done in by some extreme pace! That is some short delivery. Short ball on leg, Ramdin is fending, and the ball smashes into his glove and then lobs up towards Kusal who dives in front and completes the catch. Quick downslide for WI. But that was an extremely good delivery
full and too wide outside off, left alone easily
better. Closer towards off stump, fifth-stump line on a  good length. Left well alone
fullish outside off, MS opens the face to get the ball towards extra cover for one
tossed up on middle, not a lot of turn. Blocked
overpitched now on off, clipped to midwicket
half-volley, a little bit too much flight. Pushed back to the bowler
driven towards midwicket again with the spin, too full
a bit short on middle, worked away with the spin towards midwicket for a quick run
full and wide, deserved to be punished but Carter is too tentative outside off. Carter thinks of driving and then decides not to but he is too late. Beaten
good length outside off, played defensively into the off side
nice bouncer, good variation this with his pace. Short on middle, Carter gets under that
full on off, driven back to the bowler
lots of indecision from Carter. Good length outside off, Carter wants to play that to third man but is too hesitant. Cuts that to second slip
that is better. Good length outside off, pushed with soft hands towards mid-off for a quick run
slower outside off, Carter is beaten as the ball skids on with the arm
fullish outside off, pushed to cover
full toss outside off now, drilled to mid-off.
slider, comes in with the arm on leg. Hits MS on the pads down leg
too short on leg, rocks back and smashed to midwicket
slower on leg, a bit of flight too. Worked away with the spin to midwicket
nice short delivery. Outside off and Samuels sways out of the line and leaves
goes down leg, 142.3 ks. Hits MS on the pads again but sliding down leg
edged and just wide of the solitary slip fielder. Good length outside off, Samuels opens the face of the bat but gets it too fine, agonisingly wide of slip
goes down leg now. Hits the thigh pad on the way to the fine leg boundary. Inconsistency continues
good length outside off, Samuels wants to power a ball through the off side but tries to hit that too hard. Hits back towards mid-off
too full on leg now. Easily whipped to the midwicket boundary. Just had to find some bat on that and the whole region was vacant
lots of flight on middle, driven easily to long-on
tossed up on off and middle, pushed to cover
rank long hop and dropped. Samuels rocks back and looks to go over midwicket but doesn't get under that enough, hits it hard to midwicket who can't hold onto a sharp chance
shortish and wide, cut fiercely to the deep point
tossed up on middle, driven to the bowler
some more flight outside off now, driven to mid-off. No run
slider to start on middle, MS goes back to block
too short and wide, terrible delivery. Samuels rocks back and cuts with a lot of power to the deep point
fuller and straight on middle and off, opened the face to find a gap towards extra cover for a quick single
shortish and wide-ish. Skids on off the pitch. Left alone
offspinner outside off, Carter gets down early and plays a nice paddle sweep towards fine leg. Easy two
ah nice variation, the slower legspinner on off, Carter doesn't pick that and inside-halves to midwicket
tossed up on leg, MS hangs back and blocks under his eyes
tossed up on middle, Samuels come back and skews a ball to midwicket
short and wide, easily cut to deep point for one
tossed up outside off, pushed against the spin to mid-off
very slow outside off, Carter rocks back to play a late cut but he has to wait for so long that he misses it
offspinner on middle but a rank long-hop, Samuels rocks back and pummels a pull through square leg
slowish on middle and leg, defended
slightly wider outside off, Samuels cuts to deep point off the back foot

he is gone! That is a poor shot, and even poorer execution. Offspinner outside off, he gets down early to try and play a paddle sweep but he plays too early and the ball lobs up to Kusal who completes an easy catch. Struggled throughout the innings
short and wide, quicker one. Skids on to Holder who is beaten on the cut
googly on off, not a lot of turn. Holder prods defensively and gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
tossed up outside off, driven nicely to long-off via a misfield from cover
slider on leg, inside-edged towards square leg for one
too much flight and dispatched. Outside off and full, driven with a lot of power and exemplary timing. Races to the boundary
shortish and wide outside off, punched off the back foot to long-off
shorter length outside off, cut to point
slower outside off, MS opens the face of the bat to guide the ball in front of point for one
sliding on outside off, Samuels leaves and that just misses off stump. Skidder from Mendis
slowish on leg, turned off the back foot to deep midwicket
slider on leg, no turn. Whipped to deep square leg
googly outside off, driven to mid-off for a quick single, Malinga is a tad slow on it, and returns a throw to the keeper but Holder is in
short and wide, Holder looks to cut but misses
good start, full on off. Samuels gets behind the line and defends with the full face of the bat
nicely played, short outside off. Cut to the third man fielder off the back foot. Good timing

good length on middle, and that hits Holder in the groin area. Struck on the box. He is down. Took the wind out of him, the physio is out there but not sure what he can do. Holder takes off his helmet and takes in a few deep breaths.
close to the glove. Good bouncer on off, Holder sways out of the line and the ball kisses his shoulder on the way to the keeper. There is an appeal but that was only shoulder
shortish delivery outside off, Holder drops his wrists and sways out of the line. Good technique
full on off, Holder gets back and blocks to cover with a good stride
short and wide, cut out to the deep point fielder to get his second successive fifty. Another good knock from Marlon
another rank long-hop from Mendis on middle, Holder rocks back and just pulls it in the gap through square leg. Easy runs
tossed up outside off, driven to mid-off
slowish outside off, driven towards cover who fumbles, giving the single
the legspinner outside off, Samuels goes back and pushes to cover
closer to off, Samuels stays back and blocks
full ball on middle and leg, whipped to the vacant midwicket region for a couple
good length outside off, a bit too wide but Holder chooses to leave
shortish ball outside off, Holder sways out of the line and leaves
skids on beautifully into the bat first up and Holder makes full use of the width available. Short and wide, Holder leans on the square drive and finds the gap behind point for four

gone. This one skids onto the bat gain and Holder feathers one through to the keeper. Gentle fuller length delivery outside off and Holder looks to steer one to third man but the ball skids on quicker and Holder can only edge this through.
strays down leg and called wide
shortish length outside off, nicely dabbed to third man with the open face of the bat
slower delivery to start on off, guided to point. Brathwaite wants one but Samuels sends him back
what a shot that is. Full on middle, Brathwaite slogs one over midwicket. Just stands in his crease and clears one foot and heaves it over midwicket. That is one way to play
another slower delivery outside off, guided to third man with an open face
short on middle, Samuels clears one foot now and slogs this over midwicket. Very similar stroke,Samuels turning it on

clears the fielder at third man. Shortish delivery outside off and Samuels displays some fine batsmanship. Clears one foot and just guides one over third man with the open face. May have wanted to get that finer or squarer but goes over the fielder
slower short delivery outside off, cut out to point.
half-volley on off, Brathwaite tried to hit that too hard and ended up mis-timing his drive to mid-off
flat-batted over mid-off. What a shot. Shorter length on off, Brathwaite clears one foot and powers the pull over mid-off
good length on off, another flat-batted pull past mid-off for four more. This is some power hitting on display
short bouncer outside off, Brathwaite wants to ramp that to third man but misses
good length on middle and leg, swatted on the bounce to long-on. Clears one foot and clobbers this too
shortish delivery outside off yet again, Samuels sways out of the line
no flight, flat and full outside off, swiped to long-on
fullish on leg, worked away to the deep midwicket fielder
another cross-batted slog out to deep midwicket. Slightly full on middle and Brathwaite gets down and slog-sweeps all along the ground
shorter and wide, cut to deep point
slider on middle, slogged with a straightish bat to long-on
slowish outside off, squeezed to deep point
short outside off, cut to extra cover. Not the ball to bowl with two fielders in that point region
that is a ball you can bowl with any field. Good, tight yorker down leg but he followed Samuels as he is backing away
that is clever batting. Slower ball which is straight, Samuels backs away and plays a very delicate late cut to get the ball past short third man. Just evaded the off stump too.
short outside off, crashed past point for four. Poor delivery, perfect length to play that shot and the-set Samuels doesn't miss out

and he finds the gap yet again. Some poor strategy here. Three fielders in the circle around point and the ball is full on off from around the wicket. All Samuels needs to do is open the face of the bat and he finds the gap through extra cover
that makes more sense. Full down leg but Samuels, who is backing away, is cramped for room and can only nudge to deep midwicket
the poor bowling continues. Samuels doesn't need to do much, he is just picking the loose balls and dispatchin' em. Short and wide, Samuels lays on the cut to find the gap between third man and point
short and wide yet again. Samuels finds point with his cut this time
and the poor stuff continues. Sliding down leg and Kusal has no chance to keep that in, fired quick and well down leg. Would have been wide to the left-hander
better. Full on off and Samuels is happy to show him respect and block
and again a very loose delivery. Short and wide, Samuels is late on the cut and is beaten
fuller on middle and leg, no spin. Pushed towards short midwicket for a quick single
that was plumb. Slider on middle and leg, skids onto Brathwaite who misses his flick and is struck right in front. Not a problem with the decision. Just missed a straight one
he doesn't need to with bowling like that. Full on leg and Samuels clips the ball to the fine leg boundary as he tries to make some room.
that is a better delivery. Full down leg, Samuels looks to work this to the leg side but the ball travels to third man off the outside edge
fullish outside off, Narine is beaten on his attempted cut
short and wide now, another attempted cut, another miss
fullish on middle and leg, Narine this time presents the full face to block towards off and thinks of the single, but it isn't there
Samuels refuses the single. Interesting decision. Full on leg, the ball rolls towards deep square leg off the pad but MS says no.
short and wide, Mendis struggling with his consistency. Samuels rocks back and cuts in front of point and there is no fielder there
drifts down leg now, another wide
slider outside off, driven to deep cover
fullish on middle, driven back to the bowler
tossed up on middle, not much spin. Pushed back to Mendis
slider now on off, drilled to long-on
overpitched on leg, Samuels is happy to clip the ball to deep midwicket for a single to keep strike
low full toss on middle, driven to long-off after clearing one foot, refuses the single
full on leg, Samuels clears one foot and whacks a ball to long-off. He takes the single this time
that is good batting from Narine. Yorker outside off, dug out with a guide to third man
yorker down leg, Samuels nudges this towards backward square leg and comes back for the second
another well-executed yorker on leg, all Samuels can do is push it back to the bowler
full toss on leg, missed opportunity for MS. He heaves the full toss to midwicket along the ground
but Narine rotates strike. He clips the length delivery towards midwicket and they complete a tight single, Terrific stuff from Sunil
crashed to deep cover. Fullish outside off and MS times the ball beautifully
better from Mendis. Slider on middle, pushed back
too full, overpitched on off, driven to long-off
drifts down leg and another wide, was there a sound as it passed? Maybe not but an extra
slides in on leg, very sloppy stuff from SL. MS clips to square leg and calls for one. The fielder returns an accurate throw at the strikers end and the ball deflects for an overthrow
full outside off, driven to deep cover to keep strike

and he gets there with a late cut. Terrific knock. Plays a delicate late cut to short third man and calls for the run. Amazing knock, he is not over celebrating although, he deserves to. What a special innings.
fuller than a good length on leg, muscled off the back foot to mid-off
slower delivery outside off, cut with soft hands to point
Narine finds the gap now. shortish length outside off, SN backs away and powers a flat-batted swipe through cover. Vital runs

picked the fielder at deep square leg. Important wicket that. Fuller than a good length on middle, Narine hoicks the ball to deep square leg. Struck that sweetly but found the fielder. A look of disappointment from Narine but was a decent cameo
full on or just outside off, Rampaul guides the ball to third man but Samuels refuses the single
sliced for four. Too full outside off, Samuels clears one foot and guides the drive past point. Four more for MS
full yorker on middle, skewed to cover.
yorker on off, Samuels launches a drive to long-off. He takes the single now. wants two but it isn't there despite a fumble
slower delivery on middle, poor fielding from the cover fielder. And poor captaincy too. He has Lakmal at cover and the batsmen steal a single. Tip and run stuff
yorker on middle, swiped to long-on off the back foot
fuller on middle, pushed to deep cover. No run says MS and rightly so.
good length on middle, heaved to long-on and refuses the single
yorker on middle, smashed to long-off, Samuels wants the second but slips while Rampaul is hurtling back for the second. Lots of chaos but all good.
terrific bouncer, surprise delivery. On his badge, somehow Rampaul fends it off and plays it into the leg side. Mathews fires an inaccurate throw at the non-strikers end
slower bouncer outside off, Samuels backs away and tries to cut over point but doesn't make contact
over short cover for a couple. Shorter length outside off, Samuels flat-bats this over cover for a couple
splendid bowling. Another surprise bouncer. Fast on leg, and Samuels can only get under that. Ends the innings at 206 for 9

inn2.comm: runs immediately, poor line. Full and swinging into Perera's legs who flicks the ball nicely to deep midwicket
some swing, but starts too straight and the ball goes well down leg for another extra
good length and swinging back in, better line and starts that slightly wider outside off. Kusal is cramped for room and cuts to point
too straight yet again and clipped to deep square leg for one
full and swinging away, Dilshan drives powerfully to the left of mid-off but the crowd goes wild as the bowler has overstepped.
good length and swung away for six! Kusal just stays in his crease, clears one foot and launches one over deep square leg's head.
drifts down leg, Another wide
good length swinging in again, cramping Kusal for room who cuts towards cover
slower offcutter outside off, Kusal leaves this alone
fullish delivery, swung away this time. Pushed to mid-off
slightly shortish and wide, cut to point
may have been the slider on leg, hustled Dilshan for pace who is struck on the thigh pad and they get a leg bye as the ball rolls towards short fine leg
slower delivery on leg and middle, clipped to deep midwicket
another one of those swinging deliveries. Narine swings this one in to Dilshan who turns this/sweeps past short fine leg
missed opportunity yet again, short and wide, Dilshan smokes it to extra cover
short of a length on leg, Kusal clips to short fine leg, but the ball may have taken his thigh pad
good length on middle, worked with the angle to backward square for a quick brace
fullish on off and middle, pushed with soft hands towards mid-on for a quick single
back of a length on leg, Kusal is tucked on leg stump and he tickles this towards short fine leg
clattered to the boundary. Cannot bowl there. Short delivery on middle, Dilshan smashes one to the deep square leg boundary.
fullish length on leg, worked away with the angle to fine leg
watchfully blocked. Slower ball outside off, Dilshan comes forward and defends
nicely played. Straight bat offered and turns the ball to midwicket. Quicker offspinner on middle, Dilshan wants one but is sent back
poor shot! Quicker on leg, Dilshan wants to pull but misses. There is an appeal but too high
quick outside off, moving away. Dilshan wants to drive but misses
slower delivery outside off, blocked with his eyes right over it
shortish and wide, Dilshan doesn't miss out here. Latches onto the length and smashes the cut through point for four
good length on middle, pushed back to the bowler
fullish length on off, blocked with a full face
good length, moving away. Kusal tries to flick to the leg side but the away angle takes the ball to mid-off
back of a length on middle, blocked watchfully
slightly leg side-ish and Kusal is able to rotate the strike, turns this fullish delivery towards midwicket for one
aah, poor delivery finally. Full straying down leg and Dilshan tickles this fine to the fine leg boundary. Easy four runs
good length on leg stump, nudged to deep square leg for an easy single
very wide down leg, called wide

dropped. Cannot miss opportunities like that. A relatively simple catch too. Fuller outside off, Dilshan lobs this to point and Carter spills it. Kusal has come for the run and is sent back. To make matters worse, Carter throws the ball right into Brathwaite's hand. If ever there was a salt-in-the-wound situation, this would be it. He needs some treatment on his hand too.

this time Dilshan goes. Fullish and wide and Dilshan plays a repeat shot. Hits it uppishly and gives Carter the opportunity to make up immediately and he does so. He takes this lower and Brathwaite's mental and physical pain disappears. Very poor batting, must be said. Did not learn from his mistake.
full length on middle, solidly blocked off the front foot
full on leg, patted back defensively
back of a length on  a fifth-stump line, Thiri shapes to cut but the ball comes back a touch and he chops it towards slip
good length outside off, defended
good length on middle, skewed off the inside half towards fine leg. Beats the short fine leg fielder and they get two
full on off, solidly blocked off the front foot towards cover. Made a good sound as it left the bat
crashed through the off side. Exemplary timing. Fuller outside off and Kusal creams this through cover, albeit uppishly. Raced to the boundary
fuller than a good length on middle, squeezed to mid-on for a quick run
back of a length on middle, Thiri raises his elbow and plays right under that. Good technique
full and wide outside off, angled across the left-hander who goes for a big hit down the ground but misses altogether
straying down leg and another wide called
fullish and wide again, pushed across Kusal who throws his hands at it and hits it over cover for a couple
full on off, guided towards point
full length on middle, worked to midwicket for another single
nice from Thiri. Gets a good stride forward to push the ball to mid-off right under his eyes. A bit too full
fullish outside off, chopped towards the kepeer
fuller outside off, timed to deep point for a single. Terrific timing yet again. A bit too much width
aah, nice stroke yet again but hits the man at cover. Has to find the gaps too. Full and moving away, Thiri drives
better. Pushed with soft hands towards mid-off for a quick run. Used soft hands there
full outside off, driven with the open face to deep point
nicely played. Good length outside off, LL rocks back and punch drives the ball to deep cover
slower overpitched delivery on off, Kusal pushes that through cover with superlative timing yet again. Gets two more
back of a length on off, punched off the back foot to point
fuller outside off, Thiri pushes at that and misses, there is an appeal but he is beaten
goes after that and the thick slash goes wide of the solitary slip. Pushed across the batsman again and Thiri drives loosely
good delivery on off, played towards point with soft hands fore a quick run
full on leg, clipped to deep square leg
fuller outside off, square-driven to deep point
poor ball to begin. Slightly shorter on leg, Thiri just gets some bat on that and beats deep fine leg. The rain may have had something to do with that delivery
carrom ball on leg but, Thiri tries to flick but misses, struck on the pads
down leg yet again and worked away towards backward square
adjusts his line now. Slow and wide outside off, defended watchfully
overpitched on middle, blocked off the front foot
slower offspinner outside off, pushed into the off side towards point
good length on off, played late and steered towards point, for a quick single
good run, full on middle, pushed towards mid-on with soft hands and they quickly set off
full on off, defended to cover
full outside off, steered to point
full on leg, beats Thiri's attempted flick and is truck on the pad. only Brathwaite is appealing but that pitched well down leg
terrific shot! But hits it back to the stumps. Straightest drive you can have. Too full and caressed with a delectable drive
short ball attempted on leg and Kusal just helps it on its way to fine leg.
fuller length but Thiri doesn't pick the length, plays an attempted cut to  a slightly full length and is comprehensively beaten
shortish ball on off that doesn't get up high enough, nicely rolled his wrists on that and keeps it down towards deep square leg
back of a length on middle, patted back
swatted away. Not that short but Kusal picks the length early and swipes the ball over midwicket for another boundary.
back of a length on middle, tucked away to midwicket
full outside off, angled across. Pushed to cover
beats mid-on and the ball races across for four. Too full on leg and Thiri's timing is pretty good. Clips that nicely for four
slower delivery, fullish length on off, blocked
good length on off, guided to point
fullish and wide, driven with the open face to deep point
full on off, pushed with soft hands towards mid-off for a quick single
tonked over midwicket, the short-armed jab usually works well for Kusal. This time though he has to settle for two because Rampaul had not offered much room
sweetly threaded past point. Kusal watched the almost yorker land just beside his off stump and then directed it to deep third man
goes for the short one, but it is misdirected. Thirimanne enjoys the line down leg, swivels on his back foot and pulls it to long leg
seeks the really full delivery on off stump, not much need to move his feet, drilled through the covers
good length ball on off stump, Thirimanne is forward with a push to mid-on
right off the bottom of the bat as he looks to belt a drive down the ground. Took the length ball on the up, but perhaps was a little too enthusiastic with it. Met it before it arrived
there she blows! Overpitched from Holder, with room to boot. Kusal clobbers that right over the bowler's head. No holding back, vicious bottom-hand strength
shortish on the hips, picked away through square leg
at the other end, Thirimanne has not got his timing right. Goes early into a pull, toe ends it into the off side. Gets a couple of calming words from Kusal. Hah, that's rich.

that was silly. Innocuous length ball has been popped straight at short cover. The umpires check the West Indies captain's front foot, while he himself clutches his right side and calls for some attention from the physio. Poor shot to end an innings that did not look like it was going anywhere. Nowhere close to a half-volley and yet he couldn't stop himself driving. Perhaps he was hoping to chip it over Samuels instead of right at him
just back of a good length and outside off, too early to bother with those
a little bit of hesitation, but they recover early enough to pinch the single to Samuels at cover. Gentle little front-foot tap from Chandimal
comes in after pitching, Chandimal reads it off the surface only as he rushes back to dab towards point
stays back and cuts the shortish delivery to point. That time there was no turn
goes straight through again, Chandimal is waiting to read the deviation off the turn - on the back foot, goes for the cut, misses
tossed up a bit more, he is forward with a block

absolute ripper! Such a lovely set up from Narine, but does he have his man? This is the one that turns away, after one that was pushed in and a couple that were straight. Flighted to invite Chandimal forward, and then he plays with a closed face looking for runs on the on side. Mistake. He is beaten and Ramdin whips the bails off. But Chandimal's back foot has not strayed. Well done to all three men involved.
flighted on middle and leg, defended to midwicket
fullish length on leg and Kusal has no trouble in working this fine to fine leg
good length outside off, guided off the front foot to point
half-volley outside off, pushed to mid-off and he immediately sets off for one. Brathwaite at mid-off throws unnecessarily to the non-strikers end and with no one backing up, they get an overthrow
short and wide, powerfully cut to deep cover
good length, angled across Kusal who pushes at that towards cover
full but on leg and Kusal tucks this to deep midwicket
good length on middle and Kusal too gets to his second successive fifty. Neatly whips the ball with all wrists to square leg
good length outside off, punched off the back foot towards point, despite pushing off that back foot he completes the run

picks the man at midwicket and the crowd falls deafeningly silent. Full outside off and Kusal drags this to the man at midwicket at a good height too. He is distraught at his choice selection and that short arm jab results in his dismissal.
well-directed bouncer to greet the skipper. On middle and Mathews is hustled into ducking under
back of a length on leg and middle, tickled to fine leg
back of a length on middle, tucked to square leg. Good pacey over from Rampaul, the result of the confidence a wicket can provide
overpitched on off, in fact a yorker which is squeezed to midwicket
half-volley now outside off, driven to cover
fuller and wider outside off, tried to hit that too hard and therefore mis-times his drive to long-off
flat and quick outside off, Mathews caresses the fuller delivery to long-on
fired on leg, turned to midwicket
darted quick on middle, Chandi gets down early and executes decent sweep to deep square leg
flatter and quick outside off, Chandi is beaten
much slower through the air on middle, turned away towards square leg, played that late
nicely tossed up, slower outside off, extracting a bit of turn, hits Mathews on the pads well outside off though
some more flight outside off, played with the spin to long-on
no spin, quicker through the air outside off, patted back defensively
loose delivery. Short and wide, fiercely cut to the man at deep point
darted in outside off, played nicely with the little bit of turn to long-on
a bit slower through the air but the ball skids on from outside off, Mathews eases the ball to long-off
fired in on leg, a low full toss is played with soft hands in the gap at deep midwicket. Nicely played too. They get back for the second
yorker on middle, mis-timed drive travels to the long-on fielder
low full toss outside off, nicely timed drive past cover but the long-off fielder is quick on that and keeps it down to just the one
fired in, full, fast and wide. Clobbered to cover who fumbles and allows them the single
a bit short and wide to start, cut but to point who makes a good diving half-stop.
short ball attempted now outside off, Mathew is hurried on the shot despite the ball not  getting high. Pulled uppishly towards deep square leg
nicely driven past mid-off for a couple. Beats the mid-off fielder but the man at long-on runs around and puts in an excellent diving stop. Good committed effort from Charles
flicked with a lot of elegance. Fullish on leg and clipped to deep midwicket

short and top-edged for four. Didn't get high enough this time either and the line was good - outside off, but Mathews went through with the pull and got a thick top edge which flew over short fine leg
full outside off, nicely driven to long-on
flat again outside off, whipped to long-on
clipped to long-on yet again, a low full toss
ugly stroke from Mathews. Flatter outside off, Mathews runs down and looks to swipe but the ball hurries onto him and he gets the ball to square leg
full on leg, worked with soft hands towards the gap at deep midwicket for a quick couple
shorter now, better length. On off and pushed back to the bowler
similar length, a touch short on middle and Chandi punches this to long-on off the back foot
full outside off, pushed to cover

and there is the wicket! Just a bit of away movement and Chandi plays inside the line and gets a thin edge which is gratefully accepted by Ramdin. He throws the ball up in glee. Carter strikes. Can this spark something for WI?
short bouncer on middle, MS gets under it and a wide is called
short and wide, poor delivery. Powerfully punched away off the back foot to deep point
back of a length outside off, pushed to cover off the back foot
nice shot this. Short and wide, nicely cut to deep point. He placed that in front of point and that allowed him to come back for the second
nothing shot! Short bouncer on leg, AM gets inside the line and tries to work it down to fine leg but there was not enough conviction and the ball streaks past his pull
fuller length but wide, MS tries to cut but the ball skids on to him a touch allowing him to only chop that into the off side
short outside off, powerfully punched past cover for an easy couple
short and MS pounces on that. Timely hit. He picks the length and his hands do the rest. Smashes the pull over backward square, picks the gap between the two too. Not that it would have mattered
good length on off, blocked with a high elbow
fullish length on off, thick inside edge onto MS's pads and then towards point. Brathwaite appeals but again, he is the only one doing so
good length outside off, pushed to deep cover
back of a length on middle, worked with the angle to midwicket

that could be tight but was Mathews sent back just in time? Full length delivery, the ball sneaks past Mathews' defence and hits him on the thigh before rolling back along the pitch, Mathews runs thinking there is a single but he is sent back just in time. Carter does exceptionally well to run in and kick the ball onto the stumps with his foot but Angelo's diving effort saves him. They get an extra also
fullish outside off, MS opens the face of the bat to hit the gap at deep cover
shortish delivery on off, nicely swatted along the ground after rolling his wrists on that, hits to the man at deep square leg
strays on leg and MS works this fine with the angle and beats the man at short fine leg. Get another couple
that is hit him on the helmet. Did that rush onto him? He tried to pull but the ball hurries him and the ball rolls to third man off his helmet
full toss outside off, driven to long-on
slower offspinner outside off, inside-edged onto the pad
quicker through the air outside off, steered to point
quicker carrom ball outside off, pushed watchfully towards point
carrom ball on off, inside-edged towards square leg for a single
carrom ball on leg, MS works the ball towards square leg for a quick couple. All vital runs.
low full toss, almost a yorker. Watchfully pushed to mid-on with soft hands

another wicket falls! Opportune time to take a wicket for WI. Good length delivery and moving away, Siriwardana edges through for another catch to Ramdin. Good lines and lengths accounted for that wicket.
strays down leg and easily worked to fine leg
nicely controlled. Good short delivery on middle, Mathews pulls nicely and rolls his wrists on that. Finds the gap at backward square but he is one back foot and is unable to come back for the second
good length, slightly wider outside off. Left well alone
full and wider outside off, left alone again
tossed up outside off, solidly blocked off the front foot
slow through the air on off, pushed tomidwicket
quicker now through the air, Mathews defends watchfully
carrom ball gets a leading edge towards cover. Mathews closes the face of the bat too early and that helps takes the edge
carrom ball yet again on middle, slower on middle, inside-edged into the leg side
regulation offspinner on off, watchfully pushed to cover
good length outside off, Mathews walks across and clips this to deep square leg
fullish outside off, skewed to mid-on and Jayasuriya drives to mid-on and wants a single but Mathews send shim back
that will be four. Lots of pressure has been released. Fuller than a good length outside off, driven powerfully past cover for four.
fullish length outside off, left alone
beaten, lots of oohs and aahs. Terrific length, on that good length and slightly wide outside off. SJ flirts at that naughtily but is beaten
back of a length outside off, pushed in front of point for a quick single.
full outside off and powered to the long-off boundary. A bit too full and SJ just muscles the drive and gets SL four runs closer
back of a length on leg, tucked off his hips towards midwicket
shorter on leg, Mathews walks across and plays a good pull to the backward square region for another couple
drifts down leg and a wide is called
fuller than a good length on off, clipped towards square leg for one
good length outside off, left alone this time
good length on off, pushed towards point and SJ wants the single but is sent back wisely
tossed up outside off, blocked
slower offspinner on off, worked with the spin towards square leg
slower delivery on leg, inside-edged towards fine leg. No run
